name: Looper Tap the Beat
description:
Tap the beat and get ready to become the best beatmaker in our looper simulator. Hello stars, if you ever wondered to create music or beats, then our rolling sky simulator is for you. Tap the beat and create your own beats in our looper. Each time you tap, you will see hello stars on the rolling sky. Each star is tethered to a beat line, so make sure that those hello stars will not bump into each other in our looper, otherwise your beat will end and you will have to start the level again. Tap the beat and create coolest samples in our new rolling sky simulator: Looper Tap the Beat.

Your main target in this simulator is to create beat samples. So tap the beat and let hello stars roll in the looper. Each time you tap in the rolling sky, hello star will come out and it will start rolling in the looper. Release needed number of hello stars to create the beat, but remember that if hello stars will bump into each other your beat will fail and you will have to start the level again. So make sure that your hello stars will run in rolling sky without touching each other and your beat will be pure. Pass every level in the game and become the coolest beat maker. Many shapes of looper and skins for hello stars are waiting for you in our new rolling sky simulator so download it and start creating the most awesome beats in our looper simulator.

Looper Tap the Beat is a free to play rolling sky simulator. Create your own beats release hello stars into the looper and make sure that they will not bump into each other while they are running in the rolling sky. Tap the beat and pass every level in the game, each level will have more hello stars and new shape of looper. You may also find new awesome skins for your hello stars. So if you have ever dreamed of becoming beat maker and creating samples, our new simulator is a great way to start. Run our rolling sky simulator and start creating coolest beats ever!
